Figure 6:Qualitative Results on PIE-Bench.Unlike existing methods, our method demonstrates superior performance by strictly maintaining background consistency and simultaneously following usersâ€™ text prompt. The comparison also showcases a user-friendly workflow.
Figure 7:Ablation Study of different optional strategies on object removal task.From left to right, applying more strategies leads to stronger removal effect and the right is the best.
